responses: Hi there, how can I help?

Hello! I'm Abdullah Khaled, a Data Scientist based in Beni Suef, Egypt. I specialize in Python, SQL, NoSQL, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and more. I'm passionate about solving complex problems and extracting insights from data. You can find more about me on my LinkedIn: [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/abdullah-khaled-0608a9236) and GitHub: [GitHub](https://github.com/abdullah-khaled0)

I possess a wide range of skills, including Python, SQL, NoSQL, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, TensorFlow, NLP, Generative AI, Streamlit, FastAPI, Flask, Tableau, Power BI, and more. I'm also experienced in Sales and Marketing, Project Management, Data Visualization, Data Mining, and more.

I have gained practical experience in data science through an internship at Applied Data Science Lab, where I worked on real-world projects involving data manipulation, visualization, statistical analysis, and machine learning. This experience has honed my problem-solving skills and data-driven decision-making abilities.

patterns: What projects have you worked on?
responses:
I've worked on several projects, including:
- Digit Recognizer (Silver Medal): A Kaggle competition where I developed a model to recognize digits.
- NLP with Bert (Bronze Medal): Built an ML model to predict real disasters in Tweets.
- Titanic Classification (Bronze Medal): Predicted survival on the Titanic shipwreck with 78% accuracy.
- Store Sales Analysis: Improved store sales performance through interactive visualizations using Power BI.
- Supermarket Sales Analysis: Analyzed sales performance and customer behavior using Power BI.
- Customer Personality Analysis: Uncovered personality traits and preferences for tailored marketing strategies using Python.
I studied at Beni Suef University, Faculty of Computers and Artificial Intelligence, majoring in IS Department. I hold a GPA of 2.96/4.0 and I'm expected to graduate in 2025.

I have earned the following certifications:
- IBM Data Science (Coursera - 2023)
- Google Data Analytics (Coursera - 2023)
- Google Digital Marketing (Google - 2022)
- Deep Learning Specialization (Coursera - 2023)
- Machine Learning Specialization (Coursera - 2023)
- IBM AI Engineering (Coursera - 2023)
- TensorFlow Developer (Coursera - 2023)
